name: LEGO Portrait in Figma
description:
Hey designers! If you enjoy LEGO as much as I do and you want to free your unexpressed artistic potential, this is the right Kit for you.


What's inside:


With a basic set of bricks built as components, you can easily drag and drop them into your page and create your timeless masterpiece.


Check the instruction pages, tweak the design system and create your own portrait by adding new components and color styles.


Mickey Mouse Template:


Do you want to start step by step? No worries, I made a Mickey Mouse Template you can reconstruct using the exact same modules I've already created.


------------------------------------------------------------


Send me your creations via email or tag me on Dribbble!

luca.toscano.otto@gmail.com
